column2: BRIEF-Xinyuan Real Estate Co., Ltd. Announces Changes To Board Of Directors May 15 (Reuters) - Xinyuan Real Estate Co Ltd: * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO., LTD. ANNOUNCES CHANGES TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO LTD - BOARD WELCOMES APPOINTMENTS OF SAMUEL SHEN AND HAO GAO AS INDEPENDENT DIRECTORS * XINYUAN REAL ESTATE CO LTD - HUAI CHEN AND STEVE SUN WILL RESIGN AS DIRECTORS OF BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
